name: Rapid Re-housing Program
description: Hamilton Families housing services department provides long-term housing stability services through their Rapid Re-Housing Program to families at-risk of or currently experiencing homelessness. Through the Rapid Re-Housing program, they provide a 90-day housing search to find a viable unit within the Bay Area (no more than 2.5 hours away from San Francisco), subsidy support for up to 12 or 20 months depending on a family’s particular needs, and case management services with a Housing Stability t
